Flow.description:
Allows a hiring manager to setup their new hire as an employee - updating their information, requesting devices, etc. The wizard automatically initiates all cases, assigns training, and updates data.
1/13/2021-1/18/2021: Overhauling all screens, logic, and actions.
Flow.label: New Hire Onboarding Wizard

fields.name: title01
fields.fieldText: Welcome to the New Hire Onboarding Wizard!

fields.name: text01a
fields.fieldText: To get started, select one of your New Hires:

fields.name: text01b
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to the New Hire Onboarding Wizard!


You're all good! You do not currently have any New Hires ready for onboarding.

fields.name: text02a
fields.fieldText: First, let's review some key data about {!getContactRecord.FirstName} and make any necessary updates and selections:

fields.name: text03a
fields.fieldText: Next, let's confirm {!getContactRecord.FirstName}'s assigned work location:

fields.name: text04a
fields.fieldText: Now it's time to select the technology {!getContactRecord.FirstName} will need. Please note: other devices or supplies may be auto-requested by the wizard based on their position:

fields.name: input04_MobilePhoneNeeded
fields.fieldText: Will They Need a Mobile Phone?

fields.name: input04_DeskPhoneNeeded
fields.fieldText: Will They Need a Desk Phone?

fields.name: text05a
fields.fieldText:
As an inclusive workplace, we provide tools and reasonable accommodations to our employees with disabilities to help them with their work.


If {!getContactRecord.FirstName} has informed you of a disability, or if they have requested reasonable accommodations during the hiring process, you can invite them to complete the Accessibility Wizard. Reasonable accommodation requests can be submitted at any time during onboarding or active employment.


To invite {!getContactRecord.FirstName} to complete the Accessibility Wizard, check the box below:

fields.name: input05_AccessibilityWizardInvite
fields.fieldText: Yes, please invite them to complete the Accessibility Wizard

fields.name: title06
fields.fieldText: New Hire Orientation Session

fields.name: text06a
fields.fieldText:
All of our new employees attend an orientation session as part of their first month on the job. Orientation includes (1) an agency-wide session and (2) a bureau-specific breakout session.


(1) The agency-wide session focuses on introducing your new hire to:

  • The agency and our core mission;
  • Key employee-facing resources, systems, and supporting organizations; and
  • Critical policies and procedures that all agency employees need to know

(2) The bureau-specific breakout. session covers similar topics at a bureau level, as well as additional information as defined and tailored for the new hire's specific mission area.


To reserve {!getContactRecord.FirstName}'s spot in an upcoming orientation session, select a date below:

fields.name: text07a
fields.fieldText:
At our agency, we can grant basic network/system access by cloning another user.


Please select an existing employee we should clone to set up the {!getContactRecord.FirstName}'s initial network profile:

fields.name: text08a
fields.fieldText:
The New Hire Wizard has been completed for {!getContactRecord.FirstName}! All related data updates and requests have been submitted on your behalf.


You may now exit the New Hire Wizard.

subflows.description: Creates cases to request any products that are standard issue for this employee contact's Position (called Position Assets). See Position's Postion Assets related list.
subflows.name: flowCreateCasesFromPositionAssets
subflows.label: Create Cases from Position Assets
